name: Roy Tang
text: I have it on PS3 (and finished it there); I just got the Steam version this week because it was cheaper to get the game and the season pass on Green Man Gaming than to get the DLC from the PS store. We can do multiplayer if you want,  David Ramirez  should also have the game and he's probably willing to join.
